"Moon Man's Dinner Party" - Host a virtual dinner party on the moon with famous chefs and celebrities, complete with a menu of extraterrestrial dishes and live music performances.
"Moon-Eye Cinema" - Create an immersive movie experience on the moon, with screens set up in a natural amphitheater and seating made from lunar rock.
"Moon Mansion" - Build a luxurious mansion on the moon, complete with private gardens, a pool, and a spa, for those looking for a unique and exclusive getaway.
"Moon Olympics" - Host an intergalactic sports event on the moon, with competitions in zero gravity sports like moonball, lunar golf, and moon skiing.
"Moon Music Festival" - Organize a music festival on the moon, with artists performing on a stage set up in a stunning lunar landscape, and attendees dancing in the low gravity environment.
